Subject: Invitation to Discuss Gender Equity in STEM on Tech Futures

Hi Dr. Patel,

I’m Alex Rivera, host of the Tech Futures podcast. Our listeners are passionate about topics like Women in Tech, Diversity and Inclusion, and STEM Education – areas where your research on gender gaps in engineering education has made a tremendous impact.

We’re recording an episode titled “Gender Equity in STEM: Challenges, Initiatives, and Success Stories,” and I would be honored to have you share your insights on the systemic barriers facing women in engineering, recent initiatives that are driving change, and success stories that can inspire our audience.

Your expertise would provide a compelling, data‑driven perspective that aligns perfectly with our recent episodes on AI Ethics, Women in Tech, and STEM Education. The interview would take about 45 minutes and can be scheduled at your convenience via our online calendar.

Thank you for considering this invitation. I look forward to the possibility of featuring your voice on Tech Futures.

Best regards,
Alex Rivera
Tech Futures Podcast
alex@techfutures.com
